name: Thompson Aviation (Pty) Ltd
about: Thompson Aviation (Pty) Ltd is a renowned flight training institution with over 60 years of combined experience in the aviation industry, including flight training, airline, and charter operations. Established in 2003, the school is committed to providing safe, efficient, and cost-effective flight training. With a team of highly experienced instructors and a strong focus on safety, Thompson Aviation offers a comprehensive range of training programs. The school holds various qualifications, including New Zealand Licensed Aircraft Maintenance Engineers License (LAME) and Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Airframe and Powerplant certifications. Thompson Aviation is dedicated to nurturing aspiring pilots, ensuring they receive the highest quality training to succeed in their aviation careers.
